name: market_aggressive_small_caps
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool mboum_finance.
Tool description: Mboum Finance Official API for stocks, options, ETFs, mutual funds, SEC Data, news, screeners and more! 
API description: Fetch data for aggressive small cap stocks with earnings growth rates greater than 25% using the mboum-finance API.

start.description: The starting index for fetching the data. Defaults to 0.
